contents.text: Welcome to Horizons School of Technology, San Francisco’s premier software engineering bootcamp for college students and recent graduates.
Press 1 for program information, including curriculum and outcomes.
Press 1 to hear about our curriculum and course outcomes.
Please hold while we connect you with our curriculum specialists.

navigationGoals: I want to understand the topics covered and outcomes of your software engineering bootcamp.
I want to discuss the bootcamp’s curriculum and expected job outcomes to see if it fits my career goals.
Obtain comprehensive tech stack syllabus and detailed course outcome specifications for the bootcamp.
I’d like someone to explain your course topics and what I will learn.
Understand the bootcamp’s curriculum structure and outcomes, and how they leverage my physics background.

contents.text: Press 2 to get details on upcoming cohort dates and tuition.
Please hold while we provide information on cohort dates and tuition.

navigationGoals: Can you tell me the next cohort start dates and the tuition fees?
I need details on upcoming cohort start dates and the total tuition cost.
Retrieve timeline of upcoming cohort start dates along with a breakdown of tuition fees and payment plans.
I want to know when the next classes start and how much the tuition costs.
Get upcoming cohort start dates and tuition costs to plan around my academic schedule.

contents.text: Press 2 for admissions and financing options.
Press 1 to learn about admissions requirements.
Please hold while we connect you to an admissions specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to find out what criteria I need to meet to apply to your bootcamp.
I’m looking for the specific admissions requirements to confirm I qualify.
Determine admissions prerequisites including required programming experience, educational background, and application deadlines.
I need help understanding the application requirements to apply.
Confirm the admissions prerequisites and see if my physics coursework meets the requirements.

contents.text: Press 2 to explore financial aid and scholarship opportunities.
Please hold while we connect you with our financial aid department.

navigationGoals: I want information on available scholarships or financing plans.
I’d like to learn about financial aid and veteran scholarship options, including GI Bill coverage.
Identify available financial aid packages, scholarship eligibility criteria, and tuition financing options.
I’m interested in learning about scholarships or other financial assistance.
Explore available scholarships and financial aid options that I qualify for as a student.
